title: 平野鈴子於東京中國大使館門外抗議 直斥中國共產黨是自由世界的癌細胞

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/111447930214122/videos/403124354361237/

中國共產黨是這個自由世界的癌細胞。為了向世界各地的人傳遞日本人的想法，我於東京的中國大使館前用英文表達了自己抗議的聲音。希望大家可以把我的聲音share和擴散出去。

Protested in front of the Chinese Embassy in Tokyo on the Human Rights Day. Japanese people are also fighting for freedom. Please also join us and stand with Hong Kong and all those who have been the victims of Chinese government oppression.

人権デーの日に中国大使館前にて英語で抗議。自由を愛し、中国共産党と戦う世界中の仲間と共に、自由を勝ち取れます様に。

https://twitter.com/suzutaro26/status/1337740950760648711?s=21

On this Human Rights Day, I call for an end to human rights violation by the Chinese government! Return the 12youths to Hong Kong now.

Set free Uyghurs from concentration camp and stop wiping out Mongolian language.

I will keep voicing my opposition against you! CCP, the cancer of this free world! You can’t shut me up! We hate China for its Nazi-like evil behaviour!

Stop ethnic cleansing and stop trying to rule the world with your dirty China money!

Democracy and freedom will not succumb to Xi JinPing’s China. The CCP is the cancer of this free world! Set free Uyghurs, Tibetan, South Mongolian and Hongkongers now. Let Hong Kong be Hong Kong!
日本手足好波
